nogi_submissions.name: Rear-naked choke
nogi_submissions.description: One of the most effective submissions used in no-gi BJJ.

nogi_submissions.name: Triangle choke
nogi_submissions.description: Another highly effective submission in no-gi BJJ.

nogi_submissions.name: Chokes
nogi_submissions.description: The most highly-favored submission type among grapplers in the IBJJF no-gi.

nogi_submissions.name: Armbar
nogi_submissions.description: One of the most effective no-gi BJJ submissions.

nogi_submissions.name: Guillotine Choke
nogi_submissions.description: A submission that involves trapping your opponent's neck in a front headlock position and applying pressure to their throat.

nogi_submissions.name: Heel Hook
nogi_submissions.description: A lower-body submission that targets the heel and can cause significant damage to the opponent's leg if applied correctly.

nogi_submissions.name: Ankle Lock
nogi_submissions.description: A submission that targets the ankle joint, often used to control or submit an opponent in no-gi grappling.

nogi_submissions.name: Kneebar
nogi_submissions.description: A submission that targets the knee joint by hyperextending it, putting pressure on the ligaments and tendons.

nogi_submissions.name: Toe Hold
nogi_submissions.description: A submission that focuses on manipulating and applying pressure to the opponent's toes, potentially causing pain and submission.

nogi_submissions.name: Wrist Lock
nogi_submissions.description: A joint lock that targets the opponent's wrist, which can be a surprising and effective submission in no-gi situations.

nogi_submissions.name: Omoplata
nogi_submissions.description: A shoulder lock submission where you use your legs and body to apply pressure to your opponent's shoulder joint.

nogi_submissions.name: Bicep Slicer
nogi_submissions.description: A submission that puts pressure on your opponent's bicep, often achieved by trapping their arm between your legs and applying leverage.

nogi_submissions.name: Calf Slicer
nogi_submissions.description: A lower-body submission that targets the calf muscle and can cause intense pain and potential submission.

nogi_submissions.name: Neck Crank
nogi_submissions.description: A submission that focuses on putting extreme pressure on your opponent's neck and spine, often used to force a tapout.
